full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice
**Title:** 5P131-240064 Kouchibouguac Firewood
**Reference Number:** WS4657350852

## Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** July 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 23, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Estimated Start Date:** July 23, 2024
* **Duration:** From the date of award to March 31, 2025, with two additional one-year extension options
* **Delivery Location:** Kouchibouguac National Park, Canada
* **Tendering Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Tender Requirements

The contractor is required to supply all necessary labour, materials, and equipment to deliver Kiln Dried Firewood to the Kouchibouguac National Park in accordance with the specified requirements and conditions outlined in the tender package.

* The firewood must be delivered from May 1st to October 15 of each year.

## Contract Terms and Conditions

* The contract duration is from the date of award to March 31, 2025, with two additional one-year extension options.

## Trade Agreements

This tender notice is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable trade agreements.

## Contact Information

* Contact Person: Lyne Leger (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20190362?extsite=MjAxOTAzNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
